name: MongoDB Tool
semantic_context: Find, insert and update documents in MongoDB
natural_language_description: 这是 MongoDB Tool 节点。主要用于: Find, insert and update documents in MongoDB

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Find, insert and update documents in MongoDB
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Find, insert and update documents in MongoDB | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: document

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: createSearchIndex

collection.name: collection
collection.natural_language_description: 参数名: Collection | 作用: MongoDB Collection | (必填项)

query.name: query
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query (JSON Format) | 作用: MongoDB Find query | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: dateFields (值: None) - Comma-separated list of fields that will be parsed as Mongo Date type
useDotNotation (值: None) - Whether to use dot notation to access date fields

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Comma-separated list of the fields to be included into the new document
fields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: Comma-separated list of the fields to be included into the new document

updateKey.name: updateKey
updateKey.description: Name of the property which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id".
updateKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Key | 作用: Name of the property which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id". | 默认值: id | (必填项)

upsert.name: upsert
upsert.description: Whether to perform an insert if no documents match the update key
upsert.natural_language_description: 参数名: Upsert | 作用: Whether to perform an insert if no documents match the update key | 默认值: False

indexName.name: indexName
indexName.description: If provided, only lists indexes with the specified name
indexName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Index Name | 作用: If provided, only lists indexes with the specified name

indexNameRequired.name: indexNameRequired
indexNameRequired.description: The name of the search index
indexNameRequired.natural_language_description: 参数名: Index Name | 作用: The name of the search index | (必填项)

indexDefinition.name: indexDefinition
indexDefinition.natural_language_description: 参数名: Index Definition | 作用: The search index definition | 提示: Learn more about search index definitions here | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

indexType.name: indexType
indexType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Index Type | 作用: The search index index type | 默认值: vectorSearch | (必填项)
